doc.title: Host

value.content:
A host is a device connected to the Internet (or a local network). Some hosts called servers offer additional services like serving webpages or storing files and emails.

The host doesn't need to be a hardware instance. It can be generated by virtual machines. The host generated by virtual machines is called "Virtual hosting".

value.content: • Host on Wikipedia
